name: Lone Red Dot
description:
Something happened while I was in anabiosis. The emergency system woke me up after landing. Which seemed to be tough. The engine is nearly destroyed. Solar panels are broken. There is not enough energy for a constant rescue signal. I only have 30 rations left. Well at least oxygen system and pressure are fine.

All I have to do is try to survive as long as possible and hope for rescue.

==================================================

You can play only one day at a time.

==================================================

You can find save and logbook files in:

  • [Windows] C:\Users\[USER_NAME]\AppData\LocalLow\FelisArmis\LoneRedDot
  • [MacOS]  ~/Library/Application Support/FelisArmis/LoneRedDot

==================================================

It's the third game in my 2021:GameAMonth project.
The theme for the first month was "RITUAL".
